faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.

pricing.question: How does lomi. pricing work?
pricing.answer: lomi. offers transparent pricing with no hidden fees. We charge a simple 3.2% fee per transaction plus a small fixed fee depending on the currency. There are no setup fees, monthly fees, or hidden charges.

funds.question: When can I receive my funds?
funds.answer: Funds are typically available for withdrawal within 2 business days after a payout is completed.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you support?
payment_methods.answer: We support major credit and debit cards, and mobile money across multiple African countries.

minimum_amount.question: Is there a minimum transaction amount?
minimum_amount.answer: No, there is no minimum transaction amount. You can process payments of any size through our platform.

security.question: How secure is lomi.?
security.answer: lomi. uses industry-standard security protocols and is fully compliant with PCI DSS requirements for card payments processing. We employ encryption, tokenization, and other security measures to protect your data and your customers' information.

international.question: Can I use lomi. for international transactions?
international.answer: Yes, lomi. supports international transactions. We can process payments in multiple currencies, including USD and XOF.

story.description: We empower West African Businesses with accessible and adapted financial solutions.
story.storyParagraph1: Our journey began with the idea of building an accessible, reliable payment platform tailored to the unique needs of businesses in francophone West Africa. We recognized the challenges merchants face when connecting to local and global payment systems and set out to build an open source solution that bridges this gap. Today, we're proud to serve merchants across the region and to help them grow and thrive in the digital economy.
story.storyParagraph2: As we continue to grow, our commitment remains unwavering—to provide innovative solutions that empower entrepreneurs and businesses to reach their full potential.
story.innovationDescription: We strive to build new solutions to address the unique challenges faced by West African businesses.
story.customerObsessionDescription: We put our merchants at the center of everything we do, designing products and services that truly meet their needs.
story.integrityDescription: We uphold the highest standards of security and transparency in all our operations.
story.speedDescription: We move quickly to build, iterate, and deliver solutions that keep our merchants ahead in a rapidly evolving ecosystem.
